name: PinPong: The Pong Game!
description:
* Special Promotional Period: FREE for ONLY first TWO DAYS*

Elegant, Simple and Nostalgic!

PinPong is an addictive two player game that brings back lots of nostalgic memories.

Instructions to Play:

Swipe fingers up and down to move the paddle on screen. For left paddle, swipe the left side and similarly for the right paddle.

Salient Features include:

- Ability to set a win score
- Game Over at the selected score
- Multi-touch support for two player game

*More features coming soon :) *

*Purchase includes support and contact @AnushkMittal for almost guaranteed feature additions (if possible)*
